title: Issue with Camera Sensor when Annotation=True
body:
In BeamNG 0.24 if a camera sensor declares `annotation=true` the simulation breaks with the following error:

```
084.194|E|GameEngineLua:Exception|/lua/common/luaBinding.lua:51: bad argument #1 to 'rawget' (table expected, got nil)
=============== Stack Traceback >> START >>
(1)  C function 'function: 0x018be7e4e2f0'
(2) global C function 'rawget'
(3) Lua metamethod '__index' at file '/lua/common/luaBinding.lua:51'
  Local variables:
  t = table: 0x018b8702af78  {__index:function: 0x018b86fcae28, __newindex:function: 0x018b86fcae88, getEditorEnabled:function: 0x018b87037968 (more...)}
  k = string: "Annotation"
  mt = table: 0x018b8702af78  {__index:function: 0x018b86fcae28, __newindex:function: 0x018b86fcae88, getEditorEnabled:function: 0x018b87037968 (more...)}
  res = nil
  origgetters = nil
(4) Lua local 'handler' at line 833 of chunk 'lua/ge/extensions//util/researchGE.lua'
  Local variables:
  skt = tcp{client}: 0000018BC34DC558
  msg = table: 0x018bcd095150  {type:EngineFlags, flags:table: 0x018bcbf44498}
  flags = table: 0x018bcbf44498  {annotations:true}
  (*temporary) = table: 0x018b8702af78  {__index:function: 0x018b86fcae28, __newindex:function: 0x018b86fcae88, getEditorEnabled:function: 0x018b87037968 (more...)}
  (*temporary) = table: 0x018bcd095150  {type:EngineFlags, flags:table: 0x018bcbf44498}
  (*temporary) = number: 3
  (*temporary) = number: 2
  (*temporary) = number: 6.95137e-310
  (*temporary) = number: 8.39807e-312
(5) Lua field 'checkMessages' at line 113 of chunk 'lua/common/utils/researchCommunication.lua'
  Local variables:
  E = table: 0x018b890aa048  {handleGetPartOptions:function: 0x018b8930f2c0, handleStartTraffic:function: 0x018bcbdb3520 (more...)}
  clients = table: 0x018b8927e790  {1:tcp{client}: 0000018B8953F0E0, 2:tcp{client}: 0000018BC34DC558}
  message = table: 0x018bcd095150  {type:EngineFlags, flags:table: 0x018bcbf44498}
  err = nil
  readable = table: 0x018bcbabb448  {1:tcp{client}: 0000018BC34DC558, tcp{client}: 0000018BC34DC558:1}
  writable = table: 0x018bcbd11c30  {1:tcp{client}: 0000018BC34DC558, 2:tcp{client}: 0000018B8953F0E0, tcp{client}: 0000018B8953F0E0:2 (more...)}
  error = nil
  ret = boolean: true
  (for index) = number: 1
  (for limit) = number: 1
  (for step) = number: 1
  i = number: 1
  skt = tcp{client}: 0000018BC34DC558
  msgType = string: "handleEngineFlags"
  handler = Lua function '?' (defined at line 830 of chunk lua/ge/extensions//util/researchGE.lua)
(6) Lua function '?' at line 163 of chunk 'lua/ge/extensions//util/researchGE.lua'
  Local variables:
  dt = number: 0.646737
  obsoleteFuncIndices = table: 0x018bc5294508  {}
(7) Lua field 'hook' at line 648 of chunk 'lua/common/extensions.lua'
  Local variables:
  func = string: "onPreRender"
  funcList = table: 0x018be806cd70  {1:function: 0x018b8931d698, 2:function: 0x018b89242bc8, 3:function: 0x018b894c74e8 (more...)}
  (for index) = number: 1
  (for limit) = number: 11
  (for step) = number: 1
  i = number: 1
(8) Lua function 'luaPreRender' at file '/lua/ge/main.lua:304' (best guess)
  Local variables:
  dtReal = number: 0.646737
  dtSim = number: 0.05
  dtRaw = number: 0.0659764
  updateUIData = boolean: true
--------------- << END <<
```
